page.title: 18SOCIAL CONCERNS IN N.BRISTOL
page.content: Many varied social concerns due to dramatically different areas within N.Bristol.Some families on large council estate in Southmead exist on {poverty line}& need help from welfare state.Evidence of neglect in housing & living conditions,& high incidence of {vandalism,}petty crime & gang rivalry. Conversely in neighbouring areas where the educational expectations tend to be higher,the social concerns are related to a wealthier life.There are petitions for safer roads which are now inadequate for increased domestic & industrial traffic. There is more charity fund raising. All people are concerned with vandalism &{glue sniffing}which is more prevalent in poor areas.Much graffiti-{"No hope without dope" splashed across a recently closed school.Drunk-driving causes concern.
